description: ServiceM8 helps field service businesses schedule jobs, send quotes, and manage invoices, offering staff mobile apps and real-time job status tracking

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_CREATE_JOB_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new job note in ServiceM8. Use when you need to attach additional information to a specific job after obtaining its UUID.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_CREATE_JOB_PAYMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new job payment in ServiceM8. Use when you have collected payment details and need to record payment against a job. Example: "Create a 100.00 cash payment for job 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000 at 2023-01-01 13:00:00."

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_CREATE_JOBS
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new Job in ServiceM8. Use when you have gathered all job details and need to push a record. Example: "Create a Quote job for 123 Main St with PO #1234."

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_DELETE_JOB_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific job note. Use when you need to archive a note by its UUID.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_DELETE_JOB_PAYMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to delete (archive) a specific job payment by its UUID. Use when you need to archive a payment record.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_ASSETS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 assets. Use when you need a comprehensive asset registry, including custom fields, for inventory or reporting.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_CLIENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 clients. Use when you need a complete set of customer records for integrations or reporting.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_DOCUMENT_TEMPLATES
capabilities.description: Tool to list document templates. Use when you need to retrieve available template UUIDs and names before generating job documents.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_FORMS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 forms. Use when you need to fetch available form templates with optional filters.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_JOB_NOTES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all job notes in ServiceM8. Use when you need to fetch notes, optionally filtered or paginated.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_JOB_QUEUES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all job queues in ServiceM8. Use when you need to fetch configured queues before dispatching jobs.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_JOBS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all jobs. Use when you need to fetch all job records from your ServiceM8 account.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_LOCATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all ServiceM8 locations. Use when you need to fetch every configured location for assignments or mapping.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_MATERIALS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all materials. Use when you need a full inventory dump after authenticating with read_inventory scope.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_LIST_ALL_TASKS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all tasks in a ServiceM8 account. Use when you need to fetch task records, optionally filtered. Requires 'read_tasks' OAuth scope.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_CLIENT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific client by its UUID. Use after confirming the client's UUID is valid.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_FORM
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific form by its UUID. Use when you need up-to-date form metadata given a known form UUID.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job by its UUID. Use when you have the Job UUID and need its full record.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_ACTIVITY
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job activity by its UUID. Use when you have the job activity UUID and need its full details.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job note by its UUID. Use when you have the note UUID (e.g., after listing notes) and need its full record before processing or display.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_PAYMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job payment by its UUID. Use when you have the payment UUID and need its full record and metadata.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_JOB_QUEUE
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific job queue by its UUID. Use when you need full queue metadata before dispatching work.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_LOCATION
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific location by its UUID. Use when you already have the location's UUID and need full location details.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_MATERIAL
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific material by its UUID. Use when you have a material UUID and need current inventory or pricing details.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_RETRIEVE_STAFF_MEMBER
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific staff member by their UUID. Use when you need up-to-date staff information given a known staff UUID.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_SERVICE_M8_CREATE_JOB
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new job in ServiceM8. Use when you have all job details and need to push a record into ServiceM8. Example: "Create a Quote job for 123 Main St with PO #1234."

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_UPDATE_JOB_NOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to update details of an existing job note. Use when modifying a note after its creation.

capabilities.name: SERVICEM8_UPDATE_JOB_PAYMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to update details of an existing job payment. Use after confirming the payment UUID and desired changes.
